title: Free hextech shard
body: I got corporate undo for no reason and was just wondering if this happened to anyone else and why ( like good behavior r something)

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems you received the Corporate Mundo skin shard by opening a hextech chest a few days ago.

Let me know if you have any questions.

It sounds strange that a shard would come out of nowhere, so I dug into this for you.  It turns out that you opened a champion mastery chest and key on October 4th.  This yielded a Corporate Mundo shard!  Hope that helps clear things up!
